agent-translator.description: Multi-language translation agent — context-aware translation with tone preservation and i18n support

agentic-layer.description: Production-ready Claude Code agentic layer — skills, agents, hooks, and commands

animation-3d-card-tilt.description: 3D card tilt effect — interactive perspective transform on mouse hover with glare highlight

animation-liquid-button.description: Liquid morphing button with SVG filter hover effect

animation-noise-grain.description: Film grain and noise overlay effect using HTML Canvas

animation-webgl-background.description: Interactive WebGL shader background with animated gradients

auth-age-verification.description: Age verification gate with date picker and localStorage persistence

auth-biometric.description: Biometric authentication UI using WebAuthn API with fingerprint/face recognition

auth-sso-saml.description: SAML SSO integration module for enterprise Next.js applications

component-barcode-scanner.description: Camera-based barcode and QR code scanner using BarcodeDetector API

component-emoji-picker.description: Emoji picker with search, categories, recent emojis, and keyboard navigation

component-qr-code.description: QR code generator component with Canvas rendering and inline encoder

context-graph.description: Full-stack knowledge graph with hybrid search (vector + graph), RAG document ingestion, React visualization, and MCP integration

context-seed.description: PRD-to-packages expert guide — maps project requirements to correct npx trinity369/use commands

dashboard-charts.description: Area, bar, line, and donut chart components wrapped in shadcn Cards. Powered by recharts.

dashboard-data-table.description: Generic data table with sorting, filtering, pagination, row selection. TanStack Table + shadcn/ui.

dashboard-kpi-cards.description: KPI stat cards with trend indicators, percentage change, icons, and SVG sparklines.

dashboard-shell.description: Responsive dashboard layout shell with collapsible sidebar, topbar, breadcrumbs, and global search.

pipe-content-pipeline.description: Content creation pipeline — research, draft, edit, publish workflow

pipe-onboarding-automation.description: Automated employee/user onboarding pipeline with configurable steps per role

shop-cart.description: Shopping cart sheet with quantity controls, order summary, localStorage persistence, and empty state.

shop-category-nav.description: Hierarchical category sidebar with accordion tree, breadcrumbs, count badges, active state, and mobile sheet.

shop-checkout.description: Multi-step checkout flow with shipping, payment, review, and confirmation. react-hook-form + zod.

shop-order-history.description: Order history page with status badges, expandable row details, re-order action, date filtering, and pagination.

shop-product-detail.description: Product detail page with image gallery, variant selectors, rating, tabs for description/reviews/specs.

shop-product-grid.description: Responsive product card grid with image, price, rating, sale badges, add-to-cart, grid/list toggle.

shop-search-filters.description: Product search with faceted filters: price range, category checkboxes, color swatches, sort dropdown, and active filter badges.

shop-wishlist.description: Wishlist grid with heart toggle, move-to-cart, share list, localStorage persistence, and empty state.

skill-accessibility.description: WCAG compliance and accessibility audit skill

skill-copywriter.description: Content creation skill — SEO-aware copy, blog posts, headlines

skill-data-analysis.description: Data analysis skill — statistical analysis, data visualization, pattern recognition, reporting

skill-legal-review.description: Legal review skill — contract analysis, clause identification, risk flagging, compliance checks

skill-security.description: Security review skill — OWASP checklist, auth patterns, input validation

starter-saas-minimal.description: Next.js 14 SaaS + Shop starter with shadcn/ui, dashboard shell, product catalog, cart, and checkout.

swarm-layer.description: Thermodynamic field coordination: task fields, agent spawning, autonomous hooks, context bundles. Requires agentic-layer template and PostgreSQL.

trinity-signature.description: Animated triangle signature easter-egg for client sites
